summary: This module supplies a collection of helper utilities for configuring and managing PyTorch DataLoaders within the Lightning Fabric framework. It includes a lightweight attribute-access dictionary, wrappers for method and attribute handling, and a suite of functions that resolve sampler settings, adjust initialization arguments, set epoch values for samplers, detect iterable datasets, and compute resource-based defaults such as the number of workers. The utilities aim to streamline DataLoader preparation for both singleâ€‘node and distributed training environments.
business_intent: Enable Lightning Fabric users to set up robust, efficient data pipelines with minimal boilerplate, ensuring correct handling of samplers, worker initialization, and resource allocation across diverse hardware and distributed configurations.
